trans-unit.source: Azure Resource Manager REST API Reference
trans-unit.target: Azure Resource Manager REST API Reference

trans-unit.source: Use these APIs to manage resources through the Azure Resource Manager.
trans-unit.target: Use these APIs to manage resources through the Azure Resource Manager.

trans-unit.source: All task operations conform to the HTTP/1.1 protocol specification and each operation returns an x-ms-request-id header that can be used to obtain information about the request.
trans-unit.target: All task operations conform to the HTTP/1.1 protocol specification and each operation returns an x-ms-request-id header that can be used to obtain information about the request.

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that requests made to these resources are secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that requests made to these resources are secure.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Azure Resource Manager, see <externalLink><linkText>Azure Resource Manager Overview</linkText><linkUri>https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/resource-group-overview/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about Azure Resource Manager, see <externalLink><linkText>Azure Resource Manager Overview</linkText><linkUri>https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/resource-group-overview/</linkUri></externalLink>.
